title: Arion occultus
text:
Arion occultus is a <a href="species">species</a> of small air-breathing <a href="land%20slug">land slug</a>, a <a href="Terrestrial%20animal">terrestrial</a> <a href="pulmonate">pulmonate</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusc">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Arionidae">Arionidae</a>, the roundback slugs.
Distribution.
This species occurs in:
Description.
This recently recognized species is part of the ""Arion hortensis" group" of species. It somewhat resembles "<a href="Arion%20distinctus">Arion distinctus</a>" in general appearance, and also resembles "<a href="Arion%20obesoductus">Arion alpinus</a>", but the internal anatomy of the reproductive system is different.
